titles.title: VA Mission Telehealth Clarification Act
VA Mission Telehealth Clarification Act
VA Mission Telehealth Clarification Act

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize certain postgraduate health care employees and health professions trainees of the Department of Veterans Affairs to provide treatment via telemedicine, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Reported by Senator Moran without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 545.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
